description: This PHP source file generates an HTML page displaying software information for a network gateway device, including versions, firmware name, and model, with some dynamic content based on network type.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a string value based on a specified key, likely from a configuration or data source.

methods.name: get_wan_type
methods.description: Returns the type of WAN connection, such as 'EPON', 'DSL', or other types.
